titles.title: Recognizing June 19, 2023, as this year's observance of the historical significance of Juneteenth Independence Day.
Recognizing June 19, 2023, as this year's observance of the historical significance of Juneteenth Independence Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the historical significance to the nation of Juneteenth Independence Day (commemorating the end of slavery in the United States).
